attributes.action: force THE MUSIC to release FIRE as a single.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Criminally underated Leeds band, THE MUSIC need to release their best track from their last album.
They should be forced to do so.

rejection.details: We suggest you address the petition to the band concerned.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
